guide.introduction: As you would probably know, most of our world depends on gas or some other type of unrenewable rescource. In fact, a lot of the world's problems are caused by it. Here's a way to help the world and lessen the amount of money you pay for gas. This is a modification of an electric car and it helps power itself. You should probably know that I have never made something like this because I am too inexperienced. So, make sure it is 100% safe to ride in before you test it's performance. This project in its simplest form can be shortened to an electric car that has a generator attached to its wheel axles.

lines.text: I have absolutely no knowledge of how to make, modify, or disassemble a car, but, I do know how a generator works. If you know how a generator works, then skip this step
lines.text_raw: I have absolutely no knowledge of how to make, modify, or disassemble a car, but, I do know how a generator works. If you know how a generator works, then skip this step

lines.text: a generator is basically made of a coil of wire with strong magnets next to it.
lines.text_raw: a generator is basically made of a coil of wire with strong magnets next to it.

lines.text: the wire, the magnets, or both have to be in motion in order for the generator to work.
lines.text_raw: the wire, the magnets, or both have to be in motion in order for the generator to work.

lines.text: electricity is made of moving electrons and a magnet can push electrons along to create an electric current
lines.text_raw: electricity is made of moving electrons and a magnet can push electrons along to create an electric current

lines.text: what I have in mind is to attach a generator to the wheel axles of a car so that the wheel axle will create the kinetic energy that the generator needs to work
lines.text_raw: what I have in mind is to attach a generator to the wheel axles of a car so that the wheel axle will create the kinetic energy that the generator needs to work

lines.text: you can do one of two things
lines.text_raw: you can do one of two things

lines.text: you can have the magnets in motion and have it rotate near the generator coils
lines.text_raw: you can have the magnets in motion and have it rotate near the generator coils

lines.text: or, you can have both the magnets and the generator coils in motion which will result in an increase in electricity.
lines.text_raw: or, you can have both the magnets and the generator coils in motion which will result in an increase in electricity.

lines.text: the second option is harder because you would have to attach brushes to the generator coils in order to get electricity from it while it is in motion.
lines.text_raw: the second option is harder because you would have to attach brushes to the generator coils in order to get electricity from it while it is in motion.

lines.text: there is a third option which is to have stationary magnets with a rotating coil, but you might as well have both in motion because its more beneficial.
lines.text_raw: there is a third option which is to have stationary magnets with a rotating coil, but you might as well have both in motion because its more beneficial.

lines.text: if the electric energy produced is not enough, you may think about adding a transformer to step up the voltage
lines.text_raw: if the electric energy produced is not enough, you may think about adding a transformer to step up the voltage

lines.text: also, you could have a capacitor to store some back-up electrical charge
lines.text_raw: also, you could have a capacitor to store some back-up electrical charge
